Can you explain how this script works?
Plan: 1) Explain the logic behind the generated Python script. 2) Return the explanation.

The script uses a generator to yield Fibonacci numbers. It initializes two variables, a and b, to 0 and 1. Then it iterates up to n, yielding a, and updating a and b to be the next two numbers in the sequence.
A simple Python script to calculate Fibonacci numbers involves a loop or recursion to sum the two preceding numbers. Image of the Fibonacci sequence generated.
